testsuite.name: com.example.providerapp.ProviderContractTest

testcase.name: APIConsumer - a request for an account

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: APIConsumer - Upon a request for an account Failures:
1) Verifying a pact between APIConsumer and APIProvider - a request for an account
1.1) Connect to http://localhost:8080 [localhost/127.0.0.1, localhost/0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1] failed: Connection refused
